Prerequisite(s): Three Elemental Flux maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Your mastery of the Elemental Flux discipline knows how to read and alter the flow of magical energy. You can initiate this counter when you are targeted by a spell, power, spell-like ability, or psi-like ability. Make a Spellcraft check (DC 15 + the effect's caster or manifester level). If you succeed, you can redirect that effect to another target of your choice within the spell's range. If the effect has multiple targets, you can choose to change all of its targets to other valid targets within range. Animus augmentation: You may spend points of animus up (up to your maximum for augmenting Elemental Flux maneuvers) to gain a +2 bonus on your Spellcraft check per point spent.
